sentences.en: "Data" is the Latin plural form of "datum".
sentences.cn: data在拉丁文中是datum的复数形式。

sentences.en: Above its doors was a Latin inscription: Non omnia possumus omnes.
sentences.cn: 门的上方刻有拉丁文铭“人非万能”。

sentences.en: Carol is a tall, dark, Latin type of woman.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔身材高大，黑发棕肤，是个有着拉丁风情的女子。

sentences.en: Creolized forms of Latin were spoken in various parts of Europe.
sentences.cn: 当时欧洲各地区都讲克里奥尔语形式的拉丁语。

sentences.en: He broke with the tradition of setting examinations in Latin.
sentences.cn: 他打破了用拉丁语出试卷的传统。

sentences.en: He is well grounded in Latin.
sentences.cn: 他拉丁语的功底很扎实。

sentences.en: Her new classmates knew no Latin.
sentences.cn: 她的新同学不会拉丁语。

sentences.en: I must brush up on my Latin.
sentences.cn: 我必须把拉丁语重温一下。

sentences.en: It's astonishing, he's learned Latin in three hours!
sentences.cn: 他花了3个小时就学会了拉丁文，真让人吃惊！
拉丁美洲缺乏熟练工人。

sentences.en: Latin and Greek will be squeezed out of school timetables.
sentences.cn: 拉丁语和希腊语将退出学校的课程表。

sentences.en: Many English words are derivatives of Latin words.
sentences.cn: 许多英语词来自拉丁语.

sentences.en: Many English words are derived from Latin and Greek words.
sentences.cn: 许多英语词是从拉丁词和希腊词派生而来的.

sentences.en: Many English words are derived from Latin and Greek.
sentences.cn: 英语很多词源出于拉丁文和希腊文.

sentences.en: Over drinks , he speaks longingly of his trip to Latin America.
sentences.cn: 他带着留恋的心情, 一边喝酒一边叙述他的拉丁美洲之行.

sentences.en: Professor Calen steeps himself in Latin.
The Latin term " Vulpes " is the generic name for the various type of fox.
sentences.cn: 拉丁术语 “ Vulpes ” 是不同种类狐狸的属名.
